name: 2023 3rd International Workshop on Frontiers of Graphics and Image Processing
content: Paper Publication: Accepted papers of FGIP 2023 will be published in in the FGIP 2023 Conference Proceedings, which will be indexed by Ei Compendex, Scopus, and CPCI (Web of Science), or Journal of Image and Graphics (JOIG, ISSN: 2301-3699), indexed by Scopus, Google Scholar, Crossref, etc.
